text: So, let's describe what is layering.
Layering is synonymous with filling the order book with buy or sell orders with no intention
of being filled, creating a false impression of the liquidity of the order book.
This helps with liquidity gaining strategies.
With ladders lying on top of each other, you're effectively layering the entire ladder with false orders, with no intention of being filled.
